message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to save money, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $1050000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $980000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable price considering its value to me.

I understand you're trying to save money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1030000. This is the minimum price I'm willing to accept for the product. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $990000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $1020000. This is the last compromise I'm willing to make. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it a done deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $995000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I'm sorry, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $1020000. I've already compromised a lot, and I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price.
